overview: Kendra plays the mother to rebellious teenage daughter Avril. The two find themselves drifting apart as Kendra works too many long hours and Avril begins exploring her secret lesbian fantasies and desire to enter the porn industry. After stumbling upon some XXX movies online, Avril learns that her and her mother Kendra have more in common than she realizes. After all, like mother, like daughter. Featuring Avril Hall, Chloe Foster, Chrissy Nova, Odile, Kendra Lust, Sophia Bella and Yurizan Beltran.
tagline: There's No Drama Like Family Drama
title: Lesbian Family Dramas
